articles.title: WA border re-opens after almost 700 days - 9News
articles.description: Western Australia's been closed to much of the rest of the nation Since April 5, 2020, after Premier Mark McGowan created hard border restrictions because of COVID-19.

articles.title: Australia's economy grows 3.4 per cent as household spending soars - 9News
articles.description: New data from the Australian Bureau of Statistics (ABS) revealed the nation's Gross Domestic Product (GDP) grew 3.4 per cent compared to the September quarter 2021.
